name: blockstack-collection-schemas
description: Collection data types for use with Blockstack

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:webpack: shx rm -rf dist/* && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:webpack:watch: shx rm -rf dist/* && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode=development --watch --progress --info-verbosity verbose

author: Ken Liao
